Задача 12

а) 16F,AA 
0x16F
0x16F = 1*16^2 + 6*16^1 + F*16^0
0x16F = 256 + 96 + 15
0x16F = 367

AA
A*16^-1 +  A*16^-2  = 0.625 + 0.0390625 = 0.6640625
0x0.AA = 0.6640625

0x16F,AA = 367.6640625

б)19,CA
0x19
0x19 = 1*16^1 + 9*16^0
0x19 = 16 + 9
0x19 = 25

CA
C*16^-1 +  A*16^-2  = 0.75 + 0.0390625 = 0.7890625
0x0.CA = 0.7890625

0x19.CA = 25.7890625

в) 4A,CD 
0x4А
0x4A = 4*16^1 + A*16^0
0x4A = 64 + 10
0x4A = 74

CD
C*16^-1 +  D*16^-2  = 0.75 + 0.05078125 =0.80078125
0x0.CD = 0.80078125

0x4A.CD = 74.80078125

г) 7F,08
0x7F 
0x7F = 7*16^1 + F*16^0
0x7F = 112 + 15
0x7F = 127

08
0*16^-1 +  8*16^-2  = 0 + 0.03125
0x0.08 = 0.03125

0x7F.08 = 127.03125
